医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
桉树油对两种主要口腔疾病病原体的抗菌特性研究人员再次测试了桉树油对两种导致龋齿的细菌的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/The-antibacterial-properties-of-eucalyptus-oil-against-two-main-oral-disease-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/The-antibacterial-properties-of-eucalyptus-oil-against-two-main-oral-disease-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=049bfc49-f8cb-4162-a89a-535176ccaa15 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 06:03:00 -0400 The antibacterial properties of eucalyptus oil against two main oral disease pathogens
对于有严重 COVID-19 风险的人群，中和 SARS-CoV-2 单克隆抗体暴露前预防是否具有成本效益？最近的一项研究评估了单克隆抗体作为 COVID-19 暴露前预防 (PrEP) 的成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Could-neutralizing-SARS-CoV-2-monoclonal-antibodies-pre-exposure-prophylaxis-be-cost-efficient-in-a-population-at-严重 COVID-19 风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Could-neutralizing-SARS-CoV-2-monoclonal-antibodies-pre-exposure-prophylaxis-be-cost-efficient-in-a-population-at-严重 COVID-19 风险.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6545965c-270c-494c-a630-31e22234b87f Tue, 11 Jul 2023 05:16:00 -0400 Could neutralizing SARS-CoV-2 monoclonal antibodies pre-exposure prophylaxis be cost-effective in a population at risk for severe COVID-19?
基于 mAb 的 bELISA 开发用于检测多种动物物种中的 SARS-CoV-2 抗体研究人员开发了一种基于 mAb 的阻断酶联免疫吸附测定 (bELISA) 来检测动物中的 SARS-CoV-2。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/mAb-based-bELISA-development-to-detect-SARS-CoV-2-antibodies-in-a-broad-spectrum-of-animal-species。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/mAb-based-bELISA-development-to-detect-SARS-CoV-2-antibodies-in-a-broad-spectrum-of-animal-species。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3c7312a-3450-48da-a6b6-97b7191a1aa5 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 04:50:00 -0400 mAb-based bELISA developed to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in a broad spectrum of animal species
研究人员发现糖脂可以阻止 SARS-CoV-2 和 RSV 感染7DW8-5，一种糖脂，利用人体的非特异性免疫反应快速对抗病毒感染，包括体内的 COVID-19。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Researchers-identify-glycolipid-that-blocks-infection-with-SARS-CoV-2-and-RSV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Researchers-identify-glycolipid-that-blocks-infection-with-SARS-CoV-2-and-RSV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b9407a7-3ecc-4b81-bb9b-b554c7fc4774 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 04:22:00 -0400 Researchers identify glycolipid that blocks infection with SARS-CoV-2 and RSV
据报道，加拿大儿童的鱼类和海鲜消费率较低研究人员确定了父母因素与加拿大儿童海鲜消费之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Low-rates-of-fish-and-seafood-conspiration-reported-in-Canadian-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Low-rates-of-fish-and-seafood-conspiration-reported-in-Canadian-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=837812b1-eb56-43c3-a20b-7333ffcb09db Tue, 11 Jul 2023 04:14:00 -0400 Low rates of fish and seafood consumption reported in Canadian children
红斑痤疮神经源性炎症的遗传学研究人员在红斑痤疮家族中发现了罕见的遗传变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/The- Genetics-of-neurogenic-inflammation-in-rosacea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/The- Genetics-of-neurogenic-inflammation-in-rosacea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f4311c4-8f3e-4804-b8f6-5d53d7adabb4 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 04:08:00 -0400 The genetics of neurogenic inflammation in rosacea
据报道，针对莱姆病的新型疫苗安全有效研究人员确定了一种针对莱姆疏螺旋体病的新型候选疫苗的安全性和免疫原性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Novel-vaccine-against-Lyme-disease-reported-to-be-safe-and- effective.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Novel-vaccine-against-Lyme-disease-reported-to-be-safe-and- effective.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9a22f8c-abfc-4c6e-af67-9eecb3389a86 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 02:23:00 -0400 Novel vaccine against Lyme disease reported to be safe and effective
哥伦比亚研究人员开发出第一个全有机生物电子器件随着研究人员在医疗保健方面取得重大进展，他们还发现可以通过个体化方法来增强这些治疗的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Columbia-researchers-develop-first-complete-organic-bioElectronic-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Columbia-researchers-develop-first-complete-organic-bioelectric-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f259bad4-e6f0-463a-8e50-479031f4d456 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 22:40:42 -0400 Columbia researchers develop first fully organic bioelectronic device
英国医院大多数临终患者的需求未得到满足英国医学杂志《支持与姑息治疗》杂志在线发表的一项全英国范围内的评估发现，在没有专业姑息治疗投入的情况下在英国医院死亡的人经常有“重大且难以识别的未满足的需求”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Majority-of-dying-病人-in-UK-hospitals-have-unmet-needs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Majority-of-dying-病人-in-UK-hospitals-have-unmet-needs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=747cf7a0-3752-422d-9955-800ab2a28055 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 20:57:00 -0400 Majority of dying patients in UK hospitals have unmet needs
从事某些工作的女性可能会增加患卵巢癌的风险《职业与环境医学》在线发表的一项病例对照研究发现，美发师、美容师和会计师等某些工作岗位可能与卵巢癌风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Women-with-certain-job-roles-may-be-linked-with-heightened-risk-of-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Women-with-certain-job-roles-may-be-linked-with-heightened-risk-of-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d76fcb3-0d3a-4d24-b250-1774a363fdd4 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 20:42:00 -0400 Women with certain job roles may be associated with heightened risk of ovarian cancer
